data.content:
115. 寫C++程式碼說明傳址呼叫call by address。

call by address是把記憶體的位置傳給另一個記憶體位置上的值，
所以對形式參數所做的任何更改都會對實際參數進行相同的修改

#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

void swap(int *, int *);
int main()
{
    int a=100, b=300;
    cout << "before: " << endl;
    cout << "a=" << a << ", b=" << b <<endl;
    swap (&a, &b);
    cout << "after: " << endl;
    cout << "a=" << a << ", b=" << b << endl;
    return 0;
}
void swap(int *x, int *y)
{
    int temp;
    temp = *x;
    *x = *y;
    *y = temp;
}
